column1: 15270885$Toon Goblin Attack Force$$EARTH$[Warrior/effect]$$$$$4$2300$0$$$$This card cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. If "Toon World" on the field is destroyed
column2: destroy this card. While you control "Toon World" and your opponent controls no Toon Monsters
column3: this card can attack your opponent directly. If this card attacks
column4: it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase
column5: and its battle position cannot be changed until the End Phase of your next turn.$$$$$
